testcase.brief: (IxPort: CoF=1)Check dynamic mac learning, enable/disable, clear mac table, when IXIA ports simulate more than 8K traffic
testcase.description: Topology to use IXIA port1++++++++(port1) IXIA port2++++++++(port2) IXIA port3++++++++(port3) switch IXIA port4++++++++(port4) Description Check dynamic mac learning, enable/disable, clear mac table, when IXIA ports simulate more than 8K traffic Platform Dependence Chesapeake Pre-condition • IXIA ports connect to Switch Test procedure 1. IXIA ports(port1,port2,port3,port4) keep on sending more than 8K frames with different mac 2. Enable mac learning , check mac-table Result1 3. Disable mac learning, check mac-table Result2 4. Enable mac learning, check mac-table Result3 5. Clear mac table all entries, check mac-table Result4 6. Repeat the steps 2-5, check cpu/memory Result5 Expect result Result1: learn all the src mac sent from IXIA ports Result2: all the entries of the src mac are deleted, because mac-learning disabled Result3: learn all the src mac sent from IXIA ports again Result4: all mac entries in mac table will be deleted Result5: cpu/memory is ok

step.desc: configure 3 access ports in the same vlan
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "interface ${sw1.port1} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port2} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port3} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show mac-address-table all" -v "show interface"

step.desc: build stream, port1 sends broadcast frame with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}
check FDB, mac learned by FDB
clear all the mac entries on the interface
check all the mac entries are cleared on the interface
build stream, port1 sends broadcast frame with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}
check FDB, mac learned by FDB
check all the mac entries are cleared
